Just to provide more details about this issue.

I'm using multiple basic network block in the network.
(0): Conv2d(3, 32, kernel_size=(5, 5), stride=(1, 1))
(1): LeakyReLU (0.333, inplace)
(2): FractionalMaxPool2d (
)

The rest of Conv2d has a kernel_size=(3,3). And I have about 10 of the basic layers.
